pr_title: Fix ValueSet$expand with offset and count parameters.

timeline.message: BaseValidationSupportWrapper.expandValueSet(...) and ValidationSupportChain.expandValueSet(...) were incorrectly replacing expansion options (i.e. offset and count) with null.

timeline.bodyText: I think a better assert here would be to test that expanded.getContains().size() has a size of 1
timeline.author: jamesagnew

replies.bodyText: Agreed. I wrote those tests to be similar to the other tests in that class. I've since improved the new tests; however, I haven't gone back to change all of the old tests.
replies.author: dmuylwyk

timeline.author: jamesagnew

replies.bodyText:
Mistakes happen. : )
I'm surprised we didn't already have tests for the offset and count parameters. ¯_(ツ)_/¯
replies.author: dmuylwyk
